title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Stay warm and cozy this winter with the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat. This ETL certified ceramic portable heater fan is perfect for any indoor space - whether it's your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. 

With three modes to choose from - 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation - you can customize your comfort level. The safety features of this heater are top-notch, automatically turning off at 45 degrees to prevent accidents. 

Weighing only 2.6 pounds and measuring 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13", this space heater is compact and portable. It delivers heating in just 2 seconds with its PTC heating element, all while operating quietly at below 45 dB. 

Don't compromise on warmth and safety this season - choose the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater for efficient heating and peace of mind.

Don't let the cold get you down, bring home the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater and enjoy instant heat at the touch of a button.
